message.body: Left ##### at airport but bag overweight and flight overbooked so he will email (no phone) but I can't access my email. Will you check for me?
Want to know his flight. My ## ############
Let me know if there is an email from ###### ###### about the Common Core job
If no word from ##### then won't hear until he gets Internet access in Guatemala
No word from #####, no email from ######. Talked to ##### last night, he said he'd let me know when he's there safely.
